title: India Sweets and Spices
description: Grocery store and Indian vegetarian restaurant. Interior is clearly divided, with the grocery section being well-stocked with a wide assortment food items, all vegetarian. The restaurant section is counter service only, with a la carte as well as many dishes already prepared and kept warm in glass case display. Features spicy South Indian food, snacks, and sweets. Parking in lot next to restaurant or on street.
